file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: soap-xml-oas-design
components:
  schemas:
    payPlanschema:
      type: object
      properties:
        Envelope:
          type: object
  examples:
    payplanexample:
      value:
        Envelope: {}
paths:
  /payPlan:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              $ref: /request-schema.json#components/schemas/payPlanschema
            examples:
              PaymentPlanEx:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/payplanexample'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
              examples:
                resEx:
                  value:
                    output: 200 Response
  /payPlan2:
    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/xml:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/payPlanschema'
            examples:
              PaymentPlanEx:
                $ref: '#/components/examples/payplanexample'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
              examples:
                resEx:
                  value:
                    output: 200 Response
